name: BamlanivimabEtesevimabAdministration
title: Bamlanivimab / Etesevimab Administration
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to intravenous administration of bamlanivimab / etesevimab.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes terms related to intravenous administration of bamlanivimab / etesevimab.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes terms related to administration of bamlanivimab alone.)

concept.display: Intravenous infusion, bamlanivimab and etesevimab, includes infusion and post administration monitoring

Intravenous infusion, bamlanivimab and etesevimab, includes infusion and post administration monitoring in the home or residence; this includes a beneficiary's home that has been made provider based to the hospital during the covid 19 public health emergency
